alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 11 at 5:28PM CDT until April 11 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Franklin County in west central Arkansas... Southeastern Crawford County in northwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Sebastian County in west central Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 528 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lavaca, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Barling... Lavaca... Branch... Central City... Peter Pender... Vesta... Cecil... Ursula... Meg... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for northwestern and west central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
